headline: Watch live: Trump holds rally in Ohio to boost Vance
sentences: The Hill has removed its comment section, as there are many other forums for readers to participate in the conversation.

Video
Former President Donald Trump will hold a rally in Ohio Saturday evening.

Trump is scheduled to speak beginning at 7 p.m.
Watch the live video above.
We invite you to join the discussion on Facebook and Twitter.
The event is aimed at boosting GOP Senate candidate J.D.
Vance, who Trump has endorsed in the states Senate race.
